Name: Ditto
Ability: Transform: Effect=[If Ditto is your Active Pokemon, treat it as if it were the same card as the Defending Pokemon, including type, Hit Points, Weakness, and so on, except Ditto can't evolve, always has this Pokemon Power, and you may treat any Energy attached to Ditto as Energy of any type. Ditto isn't a copy of any other Pokemon while Ditto is Asleep, Confused, or Paralyzed.]
